thread.title: Uwe Rosler sacked as Leeds head coach
thread.title_full: Uwe Rosler sacked as Leeds head coach

title: Uwe Rosler sacked as Leeds head coach
text:
Uwe Rosler sacked as Leeds head coach 19 Oct 2015 09:16:53 
comments 
Uwe Rosler has been sacked after just five months as Leeds head coach, the club have announced. 
Rosler, 46, appointed as Neil Redfearn's replacement in May, becomes the fifth Leeds boss to be axed by chairman Massimo Cellino. 
Press Association Sport understands former Rotherham boss Steve Evans is overseeing first-team training at Thorp Arch this morning . 
Leeds slipped to a third straight Sky Bet Championship defeat on Saturday, losing 2-1 at home to Brighton, and lie 18th in the table - three points above the relegation zone. Related Sport News
